title: What Happened When Uber's CEO Started Driving for Uber
description: Dara Khosrowshahi and other executives realized drivers’ complaints were valid. They revamped the app, helping Uber attract workers and extend its lead on Lyft. Driver pay remains a sticking point.

title: Samsung Forecasts Worst Profit in Over a Decade as Tech Slump Hits Memory Chips
description: The South Korean company said it would cut memory-chip production, joining rivals in addressing the supply glut.
